transcript: I do believe I've said already that I've had three minute liqueur glasses of brandy in the entire evening. A child of two couldn't get drunk on bed.

segments.text: I do believe I've said already that I've had three minute liqueur glasses of brandy in the entire evening.
A child of two couldn't get drunk on bed.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I do believe that I have said already that I had three minuet liquor glasses of brandy in the entire evening.  A child of two couldn't get drunk of that.
